message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay that price, as it's the value you mentioned it has to you.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $90. Can we meet at $90?
I can do $95, that's as high as I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit below my budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product, can you meet me at that price?
